glosses: so; in such a way; like that (those) over there

examples.text: Az sonra da şöyle demiş: “Ben savaştan geliyorum, sizi de bir ziyaret edeyim dedim.”
examples.translation: A bit later he spoke as follows: “I am coming from the war; I said let me pay you a visit.”

etymology: From Ottoman Turkish شویله (şöyle). Analogous to böyle and öyle, but corresponding to the “distant” demonstrative pronoun şu (“that over there”).
